question:
Consider the following statements about the “Visiting Advanced Joint Research (VAJRA) Faculty Scheme”:
  1. The scheme aims to promote international collaborative research with help of overseas scientists in India
  2. It is a centrally sponsored scheme
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Visiting Advanced Joint Research (VAJRA) Faculty Scheme is a program launched exclusively to serve the overseas scientists and academicians, especially NRI/PIO/OCI to work as an adjunct for a specific time period in Indian Public funded academic and research institution. It aims to promote international collaborative research with help of overseas scientists. So, the <u>first statement is correct</u>. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u> because this scheme is not a centrally sponsored scheme but a Central Plan Scheme and hence no State/UT-wise allocation is made.
